multiple-choice.question: We choose, uniformly at random, a string consisting of 14 characters, where each character is a lowercase letter. Let $A$ be the event [defs] A = "the string contains at least one vowel". [/defs] (A vowel is one of the letters $a$, $e$, $i$, $o$, and $u$.) What is $\Pr(A)$?
